Hey, we got a good start here by positioning ourselves in the middle. Now, let's aim for that apple on the right at (9, 5). We need to cover the widest gap first, so an initial rightward movement makes sense. 

Once we cross the middle, we're gaining ground toward the apple, but not quite there yet. We could maybe try to wrap around and hit an apple on the right at (0, 4) if we go too far, but that's a bit riskier and wouldn't bring us closer to our main goal. It's better to continue moving horizontally to the right until we're in the apple column. Then an upward move will get us there.

Strategy for next turn: Keep heading right to approach the gap, then turn up when we've crossed the middle to chase the apple.
